description: ff. 155. 250 x 178; 155 x 95 mm. 16 lin. 1074 H., Mīr Muḥammad Jaʻfar ibn Mīr Ghiyāth al-Dīn. The 30th (and last) book of his al-Kāfī fī ʻiIm al-dīn: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 199 (3a: no. 1); SI, 320. Incip.: ... الحمد لله ... اما بعد فهذا کتاب الروضة ... قال حدثنى على بن ابراهىم ... عن ابى عبدالله ... انه کتب بهذه الرسالة الى اصحابه
author: Kulaynī, Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb, -941?
creator: Kulaynī, Muḥammad ibn Yaʻqūb, -941?
subject: Hadith (Shiites)—Texts—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
